startup.pitch: Artificial intelligence (AI) is the capability of computational systems to perform tasks typically associated with human intelligence

startup.deskripsi: BridgeLink is a platform that connects small real estate developers in Southeast Asia with international investors looking for promising property projects. It simplifies funding, compliance, and transparency through a secure blockchain-backed dashboard.
